'''''Non-Obligatory Request''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to find [[Strange Bead]], [[Strange Tiny Hats]], and [[Shabby Rack]] in the Commission ''[[Project Baby]]''.
